/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the breeze, and towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and creating a lens flare in the top left corner of the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
